ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups milk,   +   1/2  vanilla bean, split (Optional), 1 teaspoon unsalted butter, 4 cups cherries (with pits),   +   1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 pinch salt,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 3  eggs, 3 tablespoons heavy cream, 2 tablespoons white sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 74mg 25%, Sodium 64mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 13%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 78mg 6%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 266mg 6%
